section.heading: Proceeding by minor parent.
section.text: A minor parent, or a guardian or other legal representative of a minor parent, may maintain a proceeding on behalf of, or for the benefit of, the minor’s child.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 16-137, in section heading, substituted “Proceeding” for “Action”.

annoGroup.heading: Effective Dates
annoGroup.annotation: Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: “This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007.”

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 302 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
